SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT pk.keyword, pk.pn, pv.`url_pn`, pv.`user_pn`, pu.`url`, COUNT(pv.`url_pn`) AS `count` FROM `parsing_visit` AS pv LEFT OUTER JOIN `parsing_url`AS pu ON pv.`url_pn` = pu.`pn` LEFT OUTER JOIN parsing_data AS pd ON pv.pn = pd.visit_pn LEFT OUTER JOIN parsing_keyword AS pk ON pd.keyword_pn = pk.pn WHERE pv.`user_pn` = #{userPn} GROUP BY pv.`url_pn` ) pc WHERE
pc.count>=3

SELECT pc.`url_pn`, pc.`user_pn`, pc.`url`, pc.`count`, pc.`title`, pc.`domain`, pc.`favicon`, pc.`keyword` FROM ( SELECT pv.`url_pn`, pv.`user_pn`, pu.`url`, pu.`domain`, pu.`favicon`, COUNT(pv.`url_pn`) AS `count`, pd.`title`, pk.`keyword` FROM `parsing_visit` AS pv LEFT OUTER JOIN `parsing_url`AS pu ON pv.`url_pn` = pu.`pn` LEFT OUTER JOIN parsing_data AS pd ON pv.pn = pd.visit_pn LEFT OUTER JOIN parsing_keyword AS pk ON pd.keyword_pn = pk.pn WHERE pv.`user_pn` = #{userPn} GROUP BY pv.`url_pn` ) pc WHERE
pc.count>=3
ORDER BY pc.`count` DESC
SELECT pn, ko_name, en_name, rgb FROM parsing_color

SELECT pu.domain,pd.title, pu.favicon, pu.url, pk.pn, pk.keyword, DATE_FORMAT(pv.`register_date`,'%d-%m-%Y %h:%i:%s') AS register_date FROM `parsing_visit` AS pv LEFT OUTER JOIN `parsing_data` AS pd ON pv.pn=pd.visit_pn LEFT OUTER JOIN `parsing_url` AS pu ON pv.url_pn=pu.pn LEFT OUTER JOIN `parsing_keyword` AS pk ON pd.keyword_pn=pk.pn WHERE pv.user_pn=#{userPn} AND DATE_FORMAT(pv.`register_date`,'%d-%m-%Y')=#{date} GROUP BY pv.url_pn ORDER BY pv.register_date DESC

SELECT i.register_date, COUNT(i.register_date) AS `count` FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(pv.`register_date`,'%d-%m-%Y') AS register_date FROM `parsing_visit` AS pv WHERE pv.user_pn=#{userPn} GROUP BY pv.url_pn, pv.`register_date` ) AS i GROUP BY i.register_date ORDER BY i.register_date DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT i.register_date, COUNT(i.register_date) AS COUNT FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(pv.`register_date`,'%d-%m-%Y') AS register_date FROM `parsing_visit` AS pv WHERE pv.user_pn=#{userPn} GROUP BY pv.url_pn, pv.`register_date` ) AS i GROUP BY i.register_date ) AS hc
